Check browser downloads for exported file.","typ_category_appearance":"Appearance","lbl_lang":"Language","typ_lang_helper":"Controls current display language.","lbl_assistance_grid":"Assistance grid visibility","lbl_option_assistance_grid_visible":"Visible","lbl_option_assistance_grid_hidden":"Hidden","typ_assistance_grid_helper":"Controls whether to display an assistance grid in the background to remove some difficulties.","lbl_border_thickness":"Border thickness","typ_border_thickness_helper":"Controls thickness of borders around cells in pixels.","typ_category_gameplay":"Gameplay","lbl_color_scheme":"Color scheme","typ_color_scheme_helper":"Controls the color scheme of Periotris in JSON.","lbl_game_map":"Game map layout","typ_game_map_helper":"Controls the in-game periodic table layout in JSON.","lbl_update_interval":"Update interval","typ_update_interval_helper":"Controls the interval between two game ticks.","typ_category_misc":"Misc","lbl_concurrency":"Concurrency","typ_concurrency_helper":"Controls the maximum number of Web Workers allowed to spawn. A higher value often means quicker game preparation, but a value too large may render the app unresponsive.","lbl_export_settings":"EXPORT SETTINGS...","typ_export_settings_helper":"Save settings to a local file in JSON.","lbl_clear_all":"CLEAR ALL DATA","typ_clear_all_helper":"Delete all saved settings and progress, then reset the app."}
